note.p: French teacher. Daughter of Jean Marie Duquartier des Cognets and Félicité Jeanne Perrin. Married Edmond Barbier in 1856. Moved with him to Brighton and remained there until at least 1871. Died in France.
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG 9/602/56/42), 1871 (RG10/1082/43/30)
Paris, France & vicinity marriages, 1700–1907 (Ancestry.com, accessed 24 May 2019)
Yvelines, France, births, marriages and deaths 1734–1996 (Ancestry.com, accessed 5 December 2022)
